dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Decorative cartouche, compass rose, coats of arms.
Shows topography, drainage, cities and towns.

Includes detailed plans of the fortifications, coats of arms, an explanation of the scale of the map, decorative embellishments and a key identifying important places. Inset map of Malta and Goza near bottom.

Inset of Maltese archipelago. Compass rose with inset of Italy and islands. Dedicated by Fr Francesco dell'Antella to Giacomo Bosio. With the arms of Grand Master Alof de Wignacourt 1601-1622, 53rd Grand Master and 11th in Malta of the Langue of France. From Istoria della Sacra Religione di S. Giovanni Gerosolimitano by Giacomo Bosio. Rome 1594-1602. SSW at the top. An example of another state of this map, with the arms of Grand Master Caraffa, is bound into a Library copy of Abela and Ciantar's Malta Illustrata Malta 1772.
